results.title: [Wool Fashion Awards, 1965 and 1966]
results.brief_description: Models show a variety of garments which won the Fashion Awards for 1966. Knitted jumpers, suits, skirts, and day and evening dresses, ensembles and coats. Photographed at Eltham using Montsalvat as a background.

results.title: [Wings to Vikingland]
results.brief_description: A tour of Sweden, Norway and Denmark by an American couple. The receive a traditional Swedish welcome in Stockholm; visit Lapland and the ancient city of Visby; Norway with its many fiords and mountains; the Viking and Ski Mountains; and finally Denmark - their tour of this country included visits to the royal castle, parliament building and University of Copenhagen.
results.description: A tour of Sweden, Norway and Denmark by an American couple.
